metadata.name: Barbara
metadata.description:
Destra e sinistra.

The man on the right and the woman on the left.
According to etiquette, according to scientific explanations, too, a woman has an active right half of the brain, which is associated with emotional activity and controls the left half of the body.
And now from an energy point of view, the original arrangement of male and female principles, and it contributes to a more harmonious relationship.

I was inspired by the colors and various textures of fabrics, the beauty and curves of the female body, gold and art deco style.
